input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Christmas Tree Skirt"
Reference Product Description:
Usher in the warmth and charm of the holiday season with National Tree Company's Christmas Tree Collar. This 54 inch, red ruffle tree skirt surrounds the base of your trimmed tree to add a finishing touch to your Christmas decoration arrangement. The two-part design provides a clean, attractive finishing touch that will add a distinctive flair to your Christmas holiday centerpiece. Constructed with strong polyester materials, this seasonal decoration is sturdy and durable, allowing it to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Place this adorable skirt around the base of your tree to add a festive feel to any family room or living space. At National Tree Company, we strive to create high quality Christmas decorations to help you transform your home so you can keep making every holiday moment magical.

This 54 inch, red ruffle tree skirt surrounds the base of your trimmed tree to add a finishing touch to your Christmas decoration arrangement.
The two-part design provides a clean, attractive finishing touch that will add a distinctive flair to your Christmas holiday centerpiece.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Set aside 45-60 minutes to properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories do not have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Kurt Adler 50" Burgundy Ribbon Tree Skirt with Green Tassel Border'
  - Name='Northlight 48" Christmas Traditions Woven Plaid Velveteen Christmas Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Tree Nest Contemporary Square Canvas Christmas Tree Collar'
  - Name='Season's Designs 52In Red/Green Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Saro Lifestyle Dual-Sided Festive Knit Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Coton Colors Red Stripe Tree Skirt with Pom Poms'
  - Name='Northlight 48" Brown and White Plaid Christmas Tree Skirt with Faux Fur'
  - Name='Glitz Home Snowflake Knitted Christmas Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Glitzhome 60" Oversized Faux Rabbit Fur Christmas Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Northlight 20" Blue Sequin Snowflake Pattern Mini Christmas Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Glitzhome Merry Christmas Wooden Crate Tree Collar'
  - Name='Glitzhome Merry Christmas Wooden Crate Tree Collar'
  - Name='Northlight 20" White and Red Glitter Snowflake Mini Burlap Christmas Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Northlight Diva Safari Red Velveteen Cheetah Print Christmas Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Glitzhome 24.5" Red Wooden Tree Collar'
  - Name='Northlight 48" Red and White Winter Reindeer Embroidered Christmas Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Northlight 20" Decorative Burlap Mini Christmas Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Juvale 42-Inch Fabric Christmas Tree Skirt with Gold Trim'
  - Name='Glitzhome Merry Christmas Crate Tree Collar'
  - Name='FRONTGate Christmas Cheer Pathway Trees'
  - Name='Glitzhome 24"L Natural Wooden Merry Christmas Crate Tree Collar'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Kurt Adler 50" Burgundy Ribbon Tree Skirt with Green Tassel Border
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a traditional tree skirt, similar in use, shape, and function to the reference. Minor differences are in decorative detailing.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 48" Christmas Traditions Woven Plaid Velveteen Christmas Tree Skirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A fabric tree skirt that wraps around the tree base, aligning closely in function and construction with the reference product; only size and decorative pattern differ.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Tree Nest Contemporary Square Canvas Christmas Tree Collar
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a tree collar, which surrounds the base like a skirt, but typically has a rigid, structured silhouette rather than a fabric drape. Shares purpose but differs significantly in form.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Season's Designs 52In Red/Green Tree Skirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Standard tree skirt designed to encircle the tree base; highly relevant except for minor style and size differences.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Tree skirt with fabric construction and functional similarities, differing only by the dual-sided/kitted material details.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fabric, knitted tree skirt with a similar use case; highly relevant aside from decorative style.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: A wooden tree collar offers a rigid alternative to a skirt; similar in purpose but different material and shape.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: A wooden tree collar offers a rigid alternative to a skirt; similar in purpose but different material and shape.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Duplicate entry, rated for being a wooden collar rather than a fabric skirt.
